item.title: We were deeply honored to welcome Mr. Bilal Erdoğan and the legendary Mesut Özil...
item.description: We were deeply honored to welcome Mr. Bilal Erdoğan and the legendary Mesut Özil to our historic Dhaka University campus. It felt less like a formal meeting and more like a reunion of long-lost brothers. Their presence reflects a friendship between Bangladesh and Türkiye that goes beyond protocol and speaks to genuine human connection. The bond between Bengal and Türkiye is not new. During the Khilafat Movement, Bengalis under British rule stood in solidarity with the Ottoman world. Our literary heritage often imagined a shared civilizational horizon linking our lands and culture. Today, Bangladeshi youth are shaping a bold new chapter. With human dignity and rights, they want stronger international partnerships built on mutual respect. With support from TİKA and the inspiring presence of Mesut Özil, our ties grow stronger.

item.title: যে কোন পরামর্শ বা পর্যালোচনা জানাতে পারেন নিম্নোক্ত ইমেইলে..
